name: Hot lava !!!
description:
Tala Sultan Alsultan

My game is the floor is lava with an amazing twist the game will be inside the house your main target is to complete the game (the floor is lava)and arrive at a wonderful house at the end.

The idea of the game,the floor is lava is a game in which players pretend that the floor or ground is made of lava ,and they must avoid touching the ground ,as touching the ground would kill the player who does so.

Good luck wish you the best

My game is Roblox studio
